title: Classic Sheath Dress with Minimalist Detailing
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a classic sheath dress, knee-length, tailored fit, short cap sleeves, jewel neckline, solid deep navy color, subtle tonal topstitching, invisible back zipper, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Tailored sheath dress with cap sleeves and jewel neckline. Constructed from cotton blend with spandex for stretch. Knee-length hem, invisible back zipper closure, fully lined interior. Tonal topstitching along seams for subtle detailing.
provenance: Inspired by contemporary commercial sheath silhouettes from trending designer collections.
